articles.author: Sue Lannin
articles.title: Meta shares plunge as profit halves, Amazon sees slower growth, ASX opens lower after mixed night on Wall Street - ABC News
articles.description: Shares in Facebook owner Meta Platforms plunge after weak quarterly earnings; Amazon sees slower growth, ASX opens in the red, and the European Central Bank raises interest rates again.
articles.content:
Shares of Facebook owner Meta Platforms have plunged by nearly one-quarter, and the Australian share market has opened in the red. 
Key points:
<ul><li>The Dow Jones index rose 0.6 per cent, to 32,… [+5193 chars]

articles.author: Paul Fennessy
articles.title: Frustration as Shamrock Rovers denied famous victory in penultimate European tie - The42
articles.description: The Hoops still secured €166,000 in prize money thanks to tonight’s draw with Gent.
articles.content:
Shamrock Rovers 1
Gent 1
SHAMROCK ROVERS had to settle for a 1-1 draw at home to Gent in the Europa Conference League tonight, despite having led for the majority of the contest.

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: ESA plans for low-orbiting navigation satellites - Phys.org
articles.description: Satellite navigation is headed closer to users. ESA's Navigation Directorate is planning an in-orbit demonstration with new navigation satellites that will orbit just a few hundred kilometers up in space, supplementing Europe's 23 222-km-distant Galileo satel…
articles.content: Until now, all navigation satellites have flown high up in medium-Earth orbit up at 23 222 km in the case of Galileo, which delivers metre-level accuracy. At such altitudes the satellites move slowly… [+7705 chars]
